The difference between the two wheels [a: The wheel that was finished in six days wobbled and fell
The wheel that was finished in six days less than six months stood still as if fixed to an axle

The cause of the difference between the two wheels is that the wheel finished in six days is crooked, flawed, and defective in rim, spoke, and hub, while the wheel finished in six days less than six months is not crooked, flawed, and defective in rim, spoke, and hub.
The crooks, flaws, and defects of body,: Crooks of body, speech, and mind
Flaws of body, speech, and mind
Defects of body, speech, and mind
The training to be followed [an3.15:7.3]: Give up the crooks, flaws, and defects of body, speech, and mind.
